```{r}
#| include: false
devtools::load_all(".")
knitr::opts_chunk$set(dev = "svglite")
code <- rmarkdown::metadata$iso
```

```{r}
#| fig-width: 6.7

cowplot::plot_grid(
  digest_plot("regflow", code, basesize = basesize, font = font) |> 
    plot_label(i, h = .15 / 2.75),
  digest_plot("regnet", code, basesize = basesize, font = font) |> 
    plot_label(i + 1, h = .15 / 2.75)
)
i <- i + 2
```
